summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Season Tracker PWA iteration 3 with deployment-ready polish. All backend APIs working perfectly (9/9 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed all key features including Winter season display with 57% progress, Next Season countdown showing Spring in 38 days, functional share button, hemisphere switching, and PWA assets serving correctly.
passed_tests: Backend health endpoint returns 'healthy' status (200)
Season endpoint returns winter data for north hemisphere (56.8% complete, 50 elapsed, 38 remaining)
Season endpoint returns summer data for south hemisphere (opposite seasons working)
All seasons endpoint returns 4 seasons array for northern hemisphere
All seasons endpoint returns 4 seasons array for southern hemisphere with correct dates
Notification preferences POST saves data to MongoDB successfully
Notification preferences GET retrieves saved data correctly
PWA icons serve correctly: /icon-192.png (200), /icon-512.png (200), /favicon.ico (200)
PWA manifest.json serves correctly with proper icon paths (200)
Home page displays Winter title with 57% progress ring
Season date range shows 'December 21 — March 19' correctly
Stats row displays correct values: 50 days elapsed, 38 remaining, 88 total
Affirmation card displays seasonal text with refresh functionality
NextSeasonCard shows 'Spring' with 38 days countdown
Share button present and clickable on home page
Season timeline displays all 4 seasons with Winter highlighted as active
Bottom navigation works with Home/Seasons/Settings tabs
Seasons page shows Winter card first with 'Now' badge (active season first)
Settings page has functional hemisphere pills and notification toggle
Hemisphere switching updates data correctly (North Winter → South Summer)
Install instructions shown in settings for PWA installation
Mobile responsive design works properly at 390px width
All frontend-backend integration working seamlessly
